test-case.name: HttpClient_Tests.createRequest makes a Request with a Method and URL, and sensible defaults
HttpClient_Tests.if a body character encoding is somehow not specified, throws an exception
HttpClient_Tests.If a custom header with the same name is added multiple times, an exception is thrown
HttpClient_Tests.If the same header is added multiple times, throws an exception
HttpClient_Tests.multiple headers of different types can be added, including custom headers with different names
HttpClient_Tests.requests have cookies enabled by default
HttpClient_Tests.withAutoDecompression enables the specified decompression methods
HttpClient_Tests.withAutoFollowRedirectsDisabled turns auto-follow off
HttpClient_Tests.withBasicAuthentication encodes the username and password with ISO-8859-1 before converting to base-64
HttpClient_Tests.withBasicAuthentication sets the Authorization header with the username and password base-64 encoded
HttpClient_Tests.withBody sets the request body
HttpClient_Tests.withBody uses default character encoding of ISO-8859-1
HttpClient_Tests.withBodyEncoded sets the body encoding
HttpClient_Tests.withBodyEncoded sets the request body
HttpClient_Tests.withCookie adds the cookie to the request
HttpClient_Tests.withCookie throws an exception if cookies are disabled
HttpClient_Tests.withCookiesDisabled disables cookies
HttpClient_Tests.withHeader adds header to the request
HttpClient_Tests.withHeader Custom adds a custom header to the request
HttpClient_Tests.withKeepAlive sets KeepAlive
HttpClient_Tests.withProxy can set proxy with custom credentials
HttpClient_Tests.withProxy can set proxy with default credentials
HttpClient_Tests.withProxy can set proxy with no credentials
HttpClient_Tests.withProxy sets proxy address and port
HttpClient_Tests.withQueryString adds the query string item to the list
HttpClient_Tests.withResponseCharacterEncoding sets the response character encoding
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests._if KeepAlive is true, Connection set to 'Keep-Alive' on the first request, but not subsequent ones
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.accept-encoding header is set automatically when decompression scheme is set
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.all details of the response should be available after a call to getResponse
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.all of the manually-set request headers get sent to the server
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.all of the response headers are available after a call to getResponse
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.Content-Length header is set automatically for Posts with a body
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.cookies are not kept during an automatic redirect
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.createRequest should set everything correctly in the HTTP request
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponse should have nothing if the things don't exist
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponse, given a request with an invalid url, throws an exception
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponseBody should return an empty string when there is no body
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponseBody should return the entity body as a string
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponseCode should return the http status code for all response types
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.getResponseCode, when called on a non-existant page, returns 404

HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if a response character encoding is NOT specified, and character encoding is NOT specified in the response's content-type header, the body is read using ISO Latin 1 character encoding

HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if a response character encoding is NOT specified, and the character encoding specified in the response's content-type header is invalid, an exception is thrown
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if a response character encoding is NOT specified, the body is read using the character encoding specified in the response's content-type header
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if a response character encoding is specified, that encoding is used regardless of what the response content-type specifies
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if an invalid body character encoding is specified, throws an exception
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if an invalid response character encoding is specified, an exception is thrown
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if body character encoding is specified, encodes the request body with it
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if KeepAlive is false, Connection set to 'Close' on every request
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if the response character encoding is specified as 'utf16', uses 'utf-16' instead
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.if the response character encoding is specified as 'utf8', uses 'utf-8' instead
HttpClient_IntegrationTests+Integration tests.posts to Nancy without a body don't work
